title: (x) Wallpaper serif italic w/ swashes - Big Caslon {Geoff}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080101094953im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Italic_type_6031.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Taxi TV series logo - custom drawn (similar to Pioneer) {Patricia, Mark S}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080101094953/http:/www.typophile.com/node/19945 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Wallpaper serif face - Big Caslon {Geoff} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080101094953/http:/www.typophile.com/node/19948 "Go to next forum topic")
author: tonymcguigan

comments.content:
Again, it’s Big Caslon by Matthew Carter. The italic and the swashes are not available for retail yet, to my knowledge they were commissioned by Wallpaper Magazine.

As an alternative, especially if you’re after the swashes, you could try Adobe Caslon Pro.
